pages.text: Runic Gloves are powerful pieces of equipment that can be used for a permanent buff.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire Runic Healing Gloves, which can give you regeneration.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire Runic Speed Gloves, which can give you swiftness.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire Runic Strength Gloves, which can give you strength.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire Runic Wisdom Gloves, which can give you better deals.
